flawed_nl_solution:
It will take her 72 minutes in the washer + 50 minutes in the dryer = <<72+50=122>>122 minutes for the whites.
It will take her 58 minutes in the washer + 65 minutes in the dryer = <<58+65=213>>213 minutes for the darks.
It will take her 45 minutes in the washer + 54 minutes in the dryer = <<45+54=99>>99 minutes for the colors.
Altogether, it will take 122 minutes for whites + 213 minutes for darks + 99 minutes for colors = <<122+213+99=434>>434 minutes to do the laundry.
#### 434

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 123, not 213. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
